page.title: 02A DAY IN MY LIFE (1)
page.content: I wake up at about 6:45a.m. on weekdays.It's Thursday today,we do games.I get dressed and then I go downstairs. I am awake before anyone else so I lay the table for breakfast and go and do my paino practice. I practice the piano for about 20 minutes,then I go and have my breakfast.I have 2 helpings of cornflakes.While we are having our breakfast,our mum makes our sandwiches for us(George Helen Rachel and me.)We all go to the same school which is about 2 miles away at about 8:30a.m. I ride to school. School starts at 9:00a.m.,but I get there at 8:40a.m. When I get to school,my friends and I play Tig.At 9:00a.m. the school bell rings and we all go in.At 9:05a.m. the infants come into our class for radio assembly.At 9:30a.m. we do maths.I don't like maths
